00714   -------------------*/
00715   startline = 0;
00716 
00717   link_selected = 0;
00718   old_linkline  = startline;
00719 
00720 
00721   /*------------------------------------
00722     Get first screen of text from topic
00723   ------------------------------------*/
00724   no_lines = filbuf(offset, flag++);
00725 
00726   /*-------------------
00727     Show first screen
00728   --------------------*/
00729   wn_clear(wn);
00730   redraw_helpscreen(wn,startline,no_lines);
00731 
00732   /*----------------
00733     Show the text
00734   ----------------*/
00735   while(TRUE)
00736   {
00737     endline      = startline+height-1;
00738     linkline     = topic_link[link_selected].line;
00739     old_linkline = topic_link[old_link].line;
00740 
00741     /*----------------------------------------
00742       Hide old selected link and show new one
00743     -----------------------------------------*/
00744     /* link is on the same line */
00745     if ((link_selected != old_link) && old_linkline == linkline)
00746       show_line(wn,linkline,topic_txt[linkline]);
00747     else {
00748       if (old_linkline >= startline && old_linkline <= endline)
00749         show_line(wn,old_linkline,topic_txt[old_linkline]);
00750       if (linkline >= startline && linkline <= endline)
00751         show_line(wn,linkline,topic_txt[linkline]);
00752     }
00753 
00754     /*------------------------------------
00755       Read complete text for this topic
00756       (only once, controlled by 'flag'
00757     ------------------------------------*/
00758     no_lines = filbuf(offset, flag++);
00759 
00760     /*----------------------------------------
00761       Wait for valid keypress and react on it
00762     -----------------------------------------*/
00763     choise = waitkey();
00764     wn_log("startline = %d   endline = %d   linkline = %d ",startline,endline,linkline);
00765     wn_log("height = %d no_lines = %d ",height,no_lines);
00766     wn_log("key pressed: %x\n",choise);
00767     switch (choise)
00768     {
00769       case PAGE_UP:
00770         /*---------------------------------------
00771           Scroll the screen 1 page up
00772         ---------------------------------------*/
00773         startline -= height;
00774         endline   -= height;
00775         check_screen(&startline,&endline,no_lines);
00776         redraw_helpscreen(wn,startline,no_lines);
00777         if (linkline > endline) {
00778           link_selected = last_link_on_screen(startline,endline,&linkline,no_topics);
00779           if (linkline >= 0)
00780             show_line(wn,linkline,topic_txt[linkline]);
00781         }
00782         break;
00783 
00784       case PAGE_DOWN:
00785         /*---------------------------------------
00786           Scroll the screen 1 page down
00787         ---------------------------------------*/
00788         startline += height;
00789         endline   += height;
00790         check_screen(&startline,&endline,no_lines);
00791         redraw_helpscreen(wn,startline,no_lines);
00792         if (linkline < startline) {
00793           link_selected = first_link_on_screen(startline,endline,&linkline,no_topics);
00794           if (linkline >= 0)
00795             show_line(wn,linkline,topic_txt[linkline]);
00796         }
00797         break;
00798 
00799       case ARROW_UP:
00800         /*---------------------------------------
00801           Scroll the screen 1 line down
00802         ---------------------------------------*/
00803         if (startline > 0) {
00804           startline--;
00805           endline--;
00806           wn_scroll(wn,-1);
00807           show_line(wn,startline,topic_txt[startline]);
00808         }
00809         /*---------------------------------------
00810           Check if selected link is not
00811           outside the screen. If so, search
00812           for new link and show this line
00813         ---------------------------------------*/
00814         if (linkline >= endline) {
00815           old_link = link_selected;       /* Save old link */
00816           while (linkline >= endline && link_selected > 0) {
00817             link_selected = prev_link(link_selected,no_topics);
00818           }
00819           show_line(wn,linkline,topic_txt[linkline]);
00820         }
00821         break;
00822 
00823       case ARROW_DOWN:
00824         /*---------------------------------------
00825           Scroll the screen 1 line up
00826         ---------------------------------------*/
00827         if (endline < no_lines) {
00828           startline++;
00829           endline++;
00830           wn_scroll(wn,1);
00831           show_line(wn,endline,topic_txt[endline]);
00832         }
00833         if (linkline < startline) {
00834           link_selected = first_link_on_screen(startline,endline,&linkline,no_topics);
00835           if (linkline >= 0)
00836             show_line(wn,linkline,topic_txt[linkline]);
00837         }
00838         break;
00839 
00840       case ARROW_LEFT:
00841         /*---------------------------------------
00842           Goto previous link
00843         ---------------------------------------*/
00844         old_link = link_selected;
00845         link_selected = prev_link(link_selected,no_topics);
00846         linkline = topic_link[link_selected].line;
00847         if (linkline < startline) {
00848           startline = linkline;
00849           redraw_helpscreen(wn,startline,no_lines);
00850         }
00851         break;
00852 
00853       case HT:
00854       case ARROW_RIGHT:
00855         /*---------------------------------------
00856           Goto next link
00857         ---------------------------------------*/
00858         old_link = link_selected;
00859         link_selected = next_link(link_selected,no_topics);
00860         linkline = topic_link[link_selected].line;
00861         if (linkline > endline) {
00862           endline = linkline;
00863           startline = endline - height + 1;
00864           redraw_helpscreen(wn,startline,no_lines);
00865         }
00866         break;
00867 
00868       /*----------------------------------
00869         Get topic key if ENTER is pressed
00870       -----------------------------------*/
00871       case ENTER:
00872         if (no_topics > 0)
00873         {
00874           push_subject(subject);
00875           strcpy(current_subject,topic_link[link_selected].key);
00876           subject = current_subject;
00877         }
00878         return;
00879         break;
00880 
00881       /*---------------
00882         Quit from help
00883       -----------------*/
00884       case ESC_KEY:
00885         subject = pop_subject();
00886         if (subject)
00887         {
00888           strcpy(current_subject,subject);
00889           subject = current_subject;
00890         }
00891         return;
00892         break;
00893     }
00894   }
00895 }
